extendedInfo.description: Main Features===========- Send free messages (Over 3G or WIFI) to your friends and contacts EVEN IF THEY DONT HAVE SPONTALK!.The application sends a single SMS to the other party that contains a link. once the other party opens the link, his/her web browser will display your messages and a complete chat screen which the other party can use to send you free messages and receives yours). notice that the application sends ONLY A SINGLE SMS to the other party per chat session,so the messages after the first one are free.- Have multi-party chat sessions, add as many participants as you like.- Share your location!- MIGRATE YOUR CHAT from your mobile to your desktop, tablet or other mobile device without installing any application on those platforms!- Receive notifications when the other participants are typing their messages (even if they do not have SponTalk!)- Receive notifications when the other participants receive your messages or leaving the chat! (even if they do not have SponTalk!)=====SponTalk is a revolutionary, free messaging application, which does not require the other parties to have SponTalk in order to receive your messages.In other words, you can send free messages to (and receive messages from) your contacts even if they don't have SponTalk!Not only that, but your friends and contacts will be able to send you back free messages, even if they don't have SponTalk!* The number of messages that you and the other parties can send for free is unlimited!* SponTalk supports multi-party chat so you can add as many participants as you like to your chat.* SponTalk also enables you to migrate your chat from your Android phone to your Desktop or Tablet: All you have to do is to:choose the menu option 'Migrate', then you will get a code (see screenshots). From your other computing device (Dekstop / Tablet / other mobile phone)  Enter SponTalk's website (www.spontalk.com), press the 'Migrate here' icon, enter the code ... and That's it. your chat was migrated to your other device!* SponTalk does NOT send any personal information, including your contacts information, to anyone or to its servers (as some other IM applications do).It is also does not keep an open connection to its servers and by doing so saves your device's resources, including battery life.* If you have any questions, feel free to contact me via Support@SponTalk.comPlease notice that The SponTalk application may send a single regular SMS in order to notify your friend about his/her incoming message. that SMS will contain a link to a web page in which your friends will be able to read your messages and reply FOR FREE.Enjoy the app!Please contact me if you are experiencing any problem or if you have any question or comment:support@SponTalk.com

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: Doesnt work. Marche pas... S\303\251rieusement d\303\251\303\247us. Perte de temps. J\'ai essay\303\251 de texter mon ami au Canada. A plusieurs reprises!
reviews.author: Martialis B-A

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: It could\'ve been awesome but whenever I send texts, it always shows a dialog that says I have no credit! I thought this was free as long as there is wifi?! Btw using galaxy Y.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well-worth its claim - Free messaging
reviews.comment: 1) I\'m proud of your efforts to share this remarkable program.  2) Can u develop it:  - to allow copying of each chat bubble to be pasted elsewhere? (as in normal SMS)  - to delete each chat message separately (as in normal SMS)  3) I\'m so thrilled that this program can allow computer to type & send messages  4) I have found no problems using it  5) I had not been charged for any message  6) I had been able to send messages to anyone, including those without this program installed on their fones.  7) I\'m using a Samsung Galaxy Note  8) It does need further development for user-friendliness bcos other messaging programs are perhaps slightly easier to use  9) Of course, it uses 3G or WiFi  God bless you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its all rubbish! Message sent but never delivered..! Lol

reviews.title: Completely pointless
reviews.comment: If you\'re trying to send an SMS to someone without wifi OR 3G, then don\'t bother with this! It only sends a message asking the other person to go to a URL to view the actual text, this defeats the object entirely, I am trying to find an app that allows me to send internationally for free to someone that has NO wifi OR 3G and I can\'t find ANYTHING. Textplus ONLY lets you text to America as well so it\'s utterly crap.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: dissapointed
reviews.comment: hey i thought this app has a way to send sms free as data. but it still cost a message plan from my operator (carrier).. is it worse or i just dont know how does it work??
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uninstalled!
reviews.comment: 1. ONLY Israeli numbers are visible when I want to choose a contact from my phone-book. 2. The sent message wasn\'t displayed - instead the receiver got a link for viewing the message online. Conclusion: At this point not worth installing.
